titleStmt.title: The anatomy of an arbitrary prince, or, King James the II set forth in his proper colours, and what England may expect from such a one : written for the information and satisfaction of all the grumbletonians in Their Majesties dominions / by a son of the Church of England.
titleStmt.author: Son of the Church of England.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for R. Baldwin, near the Black-Bull in the Old-Baily,

notesStmt.note: Place of publication from NUC pre-1956.
